verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

See, <S%H7200><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%>

And I have filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and in understanding, <S%H8394><s%> and in knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> manner of workmanship, <S%H4399><s%>
To devise <S%H2803><s%> cunning <S%H4284><s%> works, to work <S%H6213><s%> in gold, <S%H2091><s%> and in silver, <S%H3701><s%> and in brass, <S%H5178><s%>

And in cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones, <S%H68><s%> to set <S%H4390><s%> them, and in carving <S%H2799><s%> of timber, <S%H6086><s%> to work <S%H6213><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> manner of workmanship. <S%H4399><s%>

And I, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> with him Aholiab, <S%H171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan: <S%H1835><s%> and in the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that are wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> I have put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> that they may make <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you;

The tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat that is thereupon, and all <S%H3605><s%> the furniture <S%H3627><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%>

And the table <S%H7979><s%> and his furniture, <S%H3627><s%> and the pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick <S%H4501><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> his furniture, <S%H3627><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense, <S%H7004><s%>
And the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering with all <S%H3605><s%> his furniture, <S%H3627><s%> and the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%>

And the cloths <S%H899><s%> of service, <S%H8278><s%> and the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office,

And the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: according to all <S%H3605><s%> that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you shall they do. <S%H6213><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> you also to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Truly <S%H389><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> you shall keep: <S%H8104><s%> for it is a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you throughout your generations; <S%H1755><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that does sanctify <S%H6942><s%> you.

You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> therefore; for it is holy <S%H6944><s%> to you: every one that defiles <S%H2490><s%> it shall surely be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> for whoever does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> may work <S%H4399><s%> be done; <S%H6213><s%> but in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest, <S%H7677><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> he shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

Why the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> throughout their generations, <S%H1755><s%> for a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

It is a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> for in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he rested, <S%H7673><s%> and was refreshed. <S%H5314><s%>

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> when he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of communing <S%H1696><s%> with him on mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of testimony, <S%H5715><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
